hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateWeightSlabsDO rateWtSlab where rateWtSlab.weightSlabDO.effectiveFrom <=:effectiveFrom AND (rateWtSlab.weightSlabDO.effectiveTo IS NULL or rateWtSlab.weightSlabDO.effectiveTo >=:effectiveTo) AND rateWtSlab.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryCode =:rateCustomerCategoryCode AND rateWtSlab.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryType =:rateProductCategoryType ORDER BY rateWtSlab.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryId, rateWtSlab.weightSlabDO.sequenceOrder, additional

FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateWeightSlabsDO rateWtSlab where rateWtSlab.weightSlabDO.effectiveFrom <=:effectiveFrom AND (rateWtSlab.weightSlabDO.effectiveTo IS NULL or rateWtSlab.weightSlabDO.effectiveTo >=:effectiveTo) AND rateWtSlab.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryCode =:rateCustomerCategoryCode AND rateWtSlab.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryCode =:rateProductCategoryType ORDER BY rateWtSlab.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryId, rateWtSlab.weightSlabDO.sequenceOrder, additional
